record.id: field.name="sharedflag" and file.name="sdArea" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: sharedflag
record.file.name: sdArea

brief.brief: Apply To flag is used to indicate whether the category is shared across different module

detail.detail: For example, if Apply To = "Interaction/Incident", this category will be created in both interaction category and incident category table.
Typical value of shared category in OOB includes Complaint, Request for Information, Incident, and Request for Administration
1) After its value is specified, it can NOT be modified.
2) If Apply To = "interaction" only, then Allow to Escalate flag can NOT be specified
